long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Golf Rankings is a chrome extension designed to provide users with real-time updates on golf tournament rankings. The extension provides a quick and convenient way for golf enthusiasts to keep track of their favorite players' performance and stay up-to-date with the latest movements in the rankings.

By clicking "Add to chrome", I accept and agree to installing the Golf Rankings extension and setting Chrome New Tab search to that provided by the service. The search will be powered by Microsoft Bing.

The extension displays a leaderboard of the current tournament on the user's browser window. The leaderboard shows the names of the top players, their current score, and their position in the PGA Tour.

Overall, a golf leaderboard chrome extension is an essential tool for avid golf fans who want to stay on top of the latest tournament news and scores. With its customizable features and real-time updates, this extension provides a convenient and easy way to follow the action and stay engaged with the sport.
